item.title: Understanding the cost of software
item.description: The standard clich√© in our industry is that software projects always take twice as long, and cost twice as much. Of the two factors, however, it’s the financial one that does the most damage. Usually, timing does little damage in itself, other than making a company run out of money. Without exaggeration, none of the companies I have worked with had a good understanding of how much a proposed software project would cost.
